attributes.action: Double hospital parking fines and give the extra money to NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is obvious that the NHS is not at it's best. By charging that extra £2.00 per visitor for example the NHS could improve vital facilites that are currently lacking in so many locations.

Many people would also decide to use public transport or even walk cutting down on carbon footprints.
